entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Deer Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:45 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -4.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Deer Lake Airport 12:30 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -4.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -6.0°C
Wind: E 19 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow or freezing rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Snow changing through ice pellets and freezing rain to rain early in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 near noon then southwest 20. High 6. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022
